channel.title: Comments on: Hong Kong Trip: Part 1 – The Scenery

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You are totally right. My Chinese is so shabby! I didn't even pay attention to the radical. Haha. Thanks for pointing it out!
item.content:encoded: You are totally right. My Chinese is so shabby! I didn’t even pay attention to the radical. Haha. Thanks for pointing it out!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha so I hear! Unfortunately my Chinese is more conversational than anything else, so it's hard for me to read go books the way I read the English ones. =(
item.content:encoded: Haha so I hear! Unfortunately my Chinese is more conversational than anything else, so it’s hard for me to read go books the way I read the English ones. =(

item.title: By: RisingStar
item.dc:creator: RisingStar
item.description: That's pretty awesome! I wish I knew some Chinese...so many good books!!!!
item.content:encoded: That’s pretty awesome! I wish I knew some Chinese…so many good books!!!!

item.title: By: Hong Kong Trip: Part 3 - Weiqi | BenGoZen
item.dc:creator: Hong Kong Trip: Part 3 - Weiqi | BenGoZen

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thank you! I usually get self-conscious about my photography, but I'm glad that you enjoyed them!
item.content:encoded: Thank you! I usually get self-conscious about my photography, but I’m glad that you enjoyed them!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha well a good portion of the people do speak Mandarin / Cantonese, but the primary language is Cantonese so it would have been an uphill battle nonetheless.
item.content:encoded: Haha well a good portion of the people do speak Mandarin / Cantonese, but the primary language is Cantonese so it would have been an uphill battle nonetheless.

item.title: By: Xezlec
item.dc:creator: Xezlec
item.description: Your photography is great. The first shot, especially, really captures the magic of being there! (Also, you're better looking than I would have thought. I guess I tend to assume other people who are interested in Go are funny-looking like me, haha!)
item.content:encoded: Your photography is great. The first shot, especially, really captures the magic of being there! (Also, you’re better looking than I would have thought. I guess I tend to assume other people who are interested in Go are funny-looking like me, haha!)

item.title: By: Xezlec
item.dc:creator: Xezlec
item.description: I was wondering that too after you knew what that character on the sign was. That explains it! So you could probably communicate with the locals if you had to just by writing things down, right? Or that's what I've been told, anyway.
item.content:encoded: I was wondering that too after you knew what that character on the sign was. That explains it! So you could probably communicate with the locals if you had to just by writing things down, right? Or that’s what I’ve been told, anyway.
